  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller (GameModel model, MessageHandler messageHandler, GameStatus gameStatus, NetworkState networkState)
      This is the constructor of the class
      Parameters:
      model - created by the GameHandler
      messageHandler - created by the server
      gameStatus - created by the server
      networkState - created by the server

  • Method Details

    • startController

      public void startController() throws PausedException
      This method is called by the game handler when the game has to start;
      Throws:
      PausedException - if the game can't start because of number of players.

    • reconnection

      public void reconnection (SocketID socketID)
      This method is used to send a message to the new player connected in order to inform him about his username, the one of the disconnected player;
      Parameters:
      socketID - contains the socket of the new player to send the message.

    • resumeGame

      public void resumeGame()
      Used to resume game after a client joins, it finds the current player and then sends a phase message.

    • checkIfLastRound

      public boolean checkIfLastRound()
      This method is called ad the end of the action phase to check if the game has ended in case of StudentOutOfStockException and to notify the clients about the winner of the game

    • updateCurrentPlayer

      public void updateCurrentPlayer() throws PausedException
      This method updates the current player in case of disconnection, turn's end and round's end.
      Throws:
      PausedException

    • pauseGame

      public void pauseGame() throws PausedException
      This method is used to pause game
      Throws:
      PausedException - when the game has to be paused because there aren't enough players.

    • isMoreThanTwoPlayers

      public boolean isMoreThanTwoPlayers()
      Used to check the number of players.
      Returns:
      true if the number of players is at least 3.

    • sendPhaseMessage

      public void sendPhaseMessage (Headers phase)
      Used to create an event containing information about the action allowed to the player.
      Parameters:
      phase - is used to create the event that contains information about the actions allowed.

    • sendErrorMessage

      public void sendErrorMessage (String string)
      Used to send an error message to the current player.
      Parameters:
      string - is the content of the message.

    • playAssistant

      public void playAssistant (int indexOfAssistant)
      this method plays the assistant card and informs the client if an error occurs, or it ends well.
      Parameters:
      indexOfAssistant - is the assistant card the player wants to play

    • moveStudents

      public void moveStudents (MoveStudentsEvent evt)
      This method let currentPlayer move 3 students from entrance to diningRoom or Island
      Parameters:
      evt - contains information about source creatures and destination

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature (int jumps)
      This method moves mother nature of the number of jumps provided by the player
      Parameters:
      jumps - is the number of jumps

    • selectCloud

      public void selectCloud (int indexOfCloud)
      Used to move students from the selected cloud to the player's entrance.
      Parameters:
      indexOfCloud - is the cloud selected by the current player

    • playCharacter

      public void playCharacter (int indexOfCharacter)
      this method play a character card, and it toggles waitingForParameters. waitingForParameters is true when the client has to specify what he wants to do with the character card he played.
      Parameters:
      indexOfCharacter - is the character the player wants to play.

    • effect

      public void effect (CharactersParametersPayload parameters)
      This method is used to use the effect of a character
      Parameters:
      parameters - contains the choice of the player, if the character needs it.

    • effect

      public void effect()
      This method is used to use the effect of a character that doesn't need player's choice.

    • getCurrentPhase

      public GamePhases getCurrentPhase()
      Used to know the game's phase
      Returns:
      the phase of the controller

    • getCurrentStatus

      public GameStatus getCurrentStatus()
      Used to know the game status
      Returns:
      is a copy of the game status

    • setCurrentStatus

      public void setCurrentStatus (GameStatus providedGS)
      Parameters:
      providedGS - is the game status to be set

    • isWaitingForParameters

      public boolean isWaitingForParameters()
      Returns:
      whether the game is waiting for character parameters

    • getCurrentPlayerPlayedCharacter

      public boolean getCurrentPlayerPlayedCharacter()
      This method is used to check if a player has already played a character in his turn.
      Returns:
      true if the player has already played a character.
